content:
Table 2: Supplement Recommendations for Gene Variations and Mutations

| Supplement Name | Supplement Form | RSID | Supplement Use-Case | Dosage |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Vitamin C |  | rs165722 | Encouraged for individuals with the 2/2 genotype to support antioxidant defense and other functions impacted by vitamin C levels | 75-90 mg/day for women, 90 mg/day for men |
| Omega-3 Fatty Acids |  | rs701492 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by omega-3 fatty acids | 250-500 mg/day of EPA and DHA combined |
| Magnesium |  | rs701492 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by magnesium levels | 320-420 mg/day for women, 400-520 mg/day for men |
| Vitamin D |  | rs701492 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by vitamin D levels | Varies based on age, sex, and other factors |
| Vitamin E |  | rs701492 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support antioxidant defense and other functions impacted by vitamin E levels | 15 mg/day |
| Magnesium |  | rs701492 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by magnesium levels | 320-420 mg/day for women, 400-520 mg/day for men |
| Coenzyme Q10 |  | rs2236225 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by coenzyme Q10 | 100-200 mg/day |
| Omega-3 Fatty Acids |  | rs2236225 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by omega-3 fatty acids | 250-500 mg/day of EPA and DHA combined |
| Vitamin D |  | rs2236225 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by vitamin D levels | Varies based on age, sex, and other factors |
| Magnesium |  | rs2236225 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support metabolic and inflammatory health and other functions impacted by magnesium levels | 320-420 mg/day for women, 400-520 mg/day for men |
| Vitamin B12 |  | rs1801133 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support neurological health and other functions impacted by vitamin B12 levels | 2.4 mcg/day for adults |
| Vitamin B6 |  | rs1801133 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support neurological health and other functions impacted by vitamin B6 levels | 1.3-1.7 mg/day for adults |
| Folate |  | rs1801133 | Encouraged for individuals with the 1/2 genotype to support neurological health and other functions impacted by folate levels | 400-800 mcg/day for adults |
|  |  |  |  |  |
